plot: An old man haunted by his past tries to piece together a story about two soldiers lost at sea. A piano tuner steps in and goes about his business while the man is lost in thought.
title: The Waves
plot_es: An old man haunted by his past tries to piece together a story about two soldiers lost at sea. A piano tuner steps in and goes about his business while the man is lost in thought.
plot_en: An old man haunted by his past tries to piece together a story about two soldiers lost at sea. A piano tuner steps in and goes about his business while the man is lost in thought.
